rules_text:
Convoke
Put three charge counters onto target permanent you control.
rules_text2:
Archaic Junglescape enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{4}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Archaic Junglescape: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
